lines: 1. Sabato mari, Ruoth, Jogi ruako gi mor;Kwarito winjo wach mari Chunywa mondo paki.
2. Wamor kuom ndaloni Ma isewalo, Ruoth; Wanaheri,Wanadendi, In Ruodh polo malo.
3. Jogi maler, gwedhgi! Bed kodwa kwalemo;Ruoth, miwa mor kuom yueyoni, Kwarito chieng` maler.
4. Kidich piny korumo, Kwadar a thurwa ka;Miwa dir kodi nyaka chieng` E dalani maler.
